scripts.test: [[ $(type -t devenvs) = 'function' ]] && devenvs; npm run lint && NODE_ENV=test mocha **/*.test.js --recursive --timeout 60s --ui tdd
scripts.deploy: cd .. && git subtree push --prefix server heroku master
scripts.deploy-force: cd .. && git push heroku `git subtree split --prefix server master`:master --force
